column4: Please be polite.  Linking to that site, or even to google, as support is not helpful.
That was in response to his repeated spamming of people with questions, and after I asked him to wait for someone who knew the answer and not spam.
Regardless though, I stopped even talking to him, so its a moot point
I don't care whether he's spamming or not, it doesn't allow you to be rude to anyone.
